name: The Snack Bar Pitcher
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces juice from freshly squeezed grapefruit (save a slice as garnish)
8 ounces sparkling white wine or sparkling rosé (Vin du Bugey or a Loire Valley sparkling wine)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a pitcher (at least 32 ounces) with ice cubes. Crush raspberries; mix with vodka and créme de framboise. Separately, mix grapefruit juice with sparkling wine. Add both mixtures to pitcher, garnish with grapefruit slice and serve.
